title: "Analysis : exp249-253 analysis"
output: html_notebook

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
library(readr)
library(gridExtra)
library(grid)
library(ggpubr)
library(cowplot)

data_path <- "~/Code/resistingrhythm/data/"
```

# Load all data

- Explore gamma=60Hz, gamma=90Hz, ripple=150 Hz

```{r, message=FALSE}
# ----------------------------------------------------------------------
# Load 8 Hz theta AMPA
# 16: tonic E, with H
exp_code <- 221
osc_codes <- c(100, 105, 110, 115, 120, 125, 130)
osc_rates <- c(0, 0.5, 1.0, 1.5, 2.0, 2.5, 3.0)
stim_codes <- c(3, 4) # 4

results221 <- NULL
for(i in 1:length(osc_codes)){
  for(s_c in stim_codes){
    o_c <- osc_codes[i]
    o_r <- osc_rates[i]
    
    # Load the csv
    df <- read_csv(paste(data_path, 
                         "exp", as.character(exp_code), 
                         "_stim", as.character(s_c), 
                         "_osc", as.character(o_c),
                         ".csv", sep=""))
    
    # Add metadata
    df$osc_code <- rep(o_c, nrow(df))
    df$osc_rate <- rep(o_r, nrow(df))
    df$stim_code <- rep(s_c, nrow(df))
    df$synapse <- rep("AMPA", nrow(df))
    df$homeo <- rep("Homeostasis", nrow(df))
    df$freq <- rep(8, nrow(df))
    results221 <- rbind(results221, df)
  }
}
results221 %>%
  filter(rate_k > 0) -> results221

# ----------------------------------------------------------------------
# g_L controls: 0.9e-3 0.95e-3 1.05e-3 1.1e-3
# 
# No H
exp_code <- 272
osc_codes <- c(100, 105, 110, 115, 120, 125, 130)
osc_rates <- c(0, 0.5, 1.0, 1.5, 2.0, 2.5, 3.0)
stim_codes <- c(3, 4) # 4
g_Ls <- c("0.9e-3", "0.95e-3", "1.05e-3", "1.1e-3")

results272 <- NULL
for(i in 1:length(osc_codes)){
  for(s_c in stim_codes){
    for(g_l in g_Ls){
      o_c <- osc_codes[i]
      o_r <- osc_rates[i]
      
      # Load the csv
      df <- read_csv(paste(data_path, 
                           "exp", as.character(exp_code), 
                           "_stim", as.character(s_c), 
                           "_gl", g_l,
                           "_osc", as.character(o_c),
                           ".csv", sep=""))
      
      # Add metadata
      df$osc_code <- rep(o_c, nrow(df))
      df$osc_rate <- rep(o_r, nrow(df))
      df$stim_code <- rep(s_c, nrow(df))
      df$synapse <- rep("AMPA", nrow(df))
      df$homeo <- rep("No homeostasis", nrow(df))
      df$g_L <- rep(g_l, nrow(df))
      results272 <- rbind(results272, df)
    }
  }
}
results272 %>%
  filter(rate_k > 0) -> results272


# H
exp_code <- 273
osc_codes <- c(100, 105, 110, 115, 120, 125, 130)
osc_rates <- c(0, 0.5, 1.0, 1.5, 2.0, 2.5, 3.0)
stim_codes <- c(3, 4) # 4
g_Ls <- c("0.9e-3", "0.95e-3", "1.05e-3", "1.1e-3")

results273 <- NULL
for(i in 1:length(osc_codes)){
  for(s_c in stim_codes){
    for(g_l in g_Ls){
      o_c <- osc_codes[i]
      o_r <- osc_rates[i]
      
      # Load the csv
      df <- read_csv(paste(data_path, 
                           "exp", as.character(exp_code), 
                           "_stim", as.character(s_c), 
                           "_gl", g_l,
                           "_osc", as.character(o_c),
                           ".csv", sep=""))
      
      # Add metadata
      df$osc_code <- rep(o_c, nrow(df))
      df$osc_rate <- rep(o_r, nrow(df))
      df$stim_code <- rep(s_c, nrow(df))
      df$synapse <- rep("AMPA", nrow(df))
      df$homeo <- rep("Homeostasis", nrow(df))
      df$g_L <- rep(g_l, nrow(df))
      results273 <- rbind(results273, df)
    }
  }
}
results273 %>%
  filter(rate_k > 0) -> results273

results <- rbind(results272, results273)
```

```{r}
results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=osc_rate, y=kappa_coord, group=interaction(osc_rate, homeo), color=homeo)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme_classic() +
  scale_color_grey() +
  facet_grid(.~g_L, scales = "free")
```


```{r, fig.width=4, fig.height=1.2}
results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=osc_rate, y=rate_k, group=interaction(osc_rate, homeo), color=homeo)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme_classic() +
  scale_color_grey() + 
  facet_grid(.~g_L, scales = "free")
```
